channel.title: Java on Chiching's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Java on Chiching's Notes

item.title: Maven 安装
item.description: windows 安装 eclipse 配置 windows 安装 下载 maven 解压到一个目录, 我放在D:\java\apache-maven-3.5.0 添加环境变量 MAVEN_HOME = D:\java\apache-maven-3.5.0, PATH=%PATH%;%MAVEN_HOME%\bin windows 10: mvn –version 检查安装结果 添加本地仓库 修改 %maven_home%\conf下面的settings.xml 文件 <!-- localRepository | The path to the local repository maven will use to store artifacts. | | Default: ${user.home}/.m2/repository <localRepository>/path/to/local/repo</localRepository> --> <!-- 添加下面行 --> <localRepository>D:\java\repository</localRepository> eclipse 配置 在Window –> Preferences 下，然后： maven -> installations， 点击添加，选择目录D:\java\apache-maven-3.5.0. (MAVEN_HOME) maven -> user settings，user settings选择D:\java\apache-maven-3.
